structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Access to criminal records by cabinet's agents.
law.text: For the purpose of enforcing the provisions of KRS 194A.505 and KRS 205.8451 to 205.8483 and of investigating any assistance program administered by the cabinet, the designated agents of the cabinet shall have the same access as peace officers to records maintained under KRS 17.150.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 26, effective July 15, 1998.
